title: Critical Literacy-Based Literary Appreciation Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic literary theory and analytical skills
context.additional_context: Graduate-level science course analyzing literary works in VR environments to critically examine social relationships and power structures

learning_goals: Learners can analyze power relationships within literary works with 80% accuracy through VR simulations.
Learners can explain three or more social contexts within a work using critical literacy tools.
Learners can revise their analysis results two or more times based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
